    • addShipping

      public boolean addShipping​(order.management.IShipping shipping) throws order.exceptions.OrderException
      Add a shipping to the order.
      Specified by:
      addShipping in interface order.management.IOrder
      Parameters:
      shipping - shipping details
      Returns:
      true if the shipping is inserted in the order. The number of shipping should limited to the number defined for each order false if there isn't more space in the order.
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.OrderException - if the order is closed or if @param shipping is null.

    • removeShipping

      public boolean removeShipping​(order.management.IShipping shipping) throws order.exceptions.OrderException
      Remove a shipping from the order.
      Specified by:
      removeShipping in interface order.management.IOrder
      Parameters:
      shipping - shipping details
      Returns:
      true if the shipping is removed in the order. false if the shipping doesn't exist
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.OrderException - if the order is closed or if @param shipping is null.

    • validate

      public void validate() throws order.exceptions.OrderException, order.exceptions.ContainerException, order.exceptions.PositionException
      Validate if all containers are valid, if all items are placed inside containers, and if the same item is not placed inside multiple containers.
      Specified by:
      validate in interface order.management.IOrder
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.OrderException - if items are not placed into containers, and if the same item is placed inside multiple containers
      order.exceptions.ContainerException - if the volume greater than the current volume
      order.exceptions.PositionException - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item.

    • close

      public void close() throws order.exceptions.OrderException, order.exceptions.ContainerException, order.exceptions.PositionException
      Close the order. Before closing a validation procedure is performed. And, verifies if all items were ShipmentStatus.RECEIVED by the destination. The shippings not ShipmentStatus.RECEIVED must be ShipmentStatus.CANCELLED.
      Specified by:
      close in interface order.management.IOrder
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.OrderException - if items are not placed into containers, and if the same item is placed inside multiple containers
      order.exceptions.ContainerException - if the volume greater than the current volume
      order.exceptions.PositionException - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item

    • isClosed

      Return the closed status of the order.
      Specified by:
      isClosed in interface order.management.IOrder
      Returns:
      true if the order is closed, false if the order is not closed.
